page.title: 19Local Amenities
page.content: In{Nantyffyllon}we have a wide choice of{amenities}but most of them are for older children and grown ups. The old library is where lots of activities take place:_ disco on Wednesday and Friday: bingo Monday, Thursday and Saturday: snooker,weight lifting and dancing. At my school the brownies meet on Tuesday evenings and cubs on Friday evenings. There are two Rugby and football clubs where boys can train. There are many pubs and clubs where there are darts and skittles which keep our parents busy in the nights. There is a gardening club near the Llynfi river. In Trinity chapel there is Sunday school and band of hope which is fun. There is a B.M.X. track on a local mountain. There is also jazz band in the area where children can go in the evenings.
